channel.title: CVE Feed for OpenDDS -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for OpenDDS -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-23932|2024-08-02T10:42:27.098Z -- opendds -- opendds
item.description: OpenDDS is an open source C++ implementation of the Object Management Group (OMG) Data Distribution Service (DDS). OpenDDS applications that are exposed to untrusted RTPS network traffic may crash when parsing badly-formed input. This issue has been patched in version 3.23.1.
